### Vancouver Trees Dashboard <img src="/vancouvertrees/favicon.png" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: middle; margin-right: 0.25em; margin-left: 0.25em; margin-bottom: 0.1em;">

A web app for exploring all public trees in Vancouver. Includes an interactive map, Google Street View integration, a table for exploring species, and a heatmap for exploring tree height by neighbourhood.
